item.title: Optimising CoffeeScript files with r.js - "Unexpected Character"
item.description: The Problem… When trying to optimise a coffeescript project with the latest r.js optimiser from the requirejs npm module I ran into the following error: Cannot uglify file: /path/to/main.js. Skipping it. Error is: Unexpected character '' (line: 363, col: 3, pos: 15612) I downloaded the uglify-js package which r.js is using here to minify the script. Running it on the file in question in the output directory of the r.js build process gave me more information - specifically that uglify is dying on the character sequence ï»¿ - a utf-8 byte order mark.
